Casey, App (2014)

Casey was a small startup aimed at people like myself who are terrible with money and not always able to budget on a monthly basis. So, we set out to build an application that enabled easy budgeting and smart prompts around when you get paid, not a rigid set of weekly or monthly intervals. Research shows that 49% of Americans still live paycheck-to-paycheck. Our goal was to help people get the most out of each of them.

The aesthetic of the app was meant to be light, fun, and occasionally tongue-in-cheek as managing finances can be inherently dull. This aesthetic and conversational design has certainly bled into the work I do at a much larger scale at Starbucks

All work subject to its obvious copyrights. All Starbucks work with due credit to the dream team of super talented friends I'm collaborating with on all of it.
